apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the kiss person (woman, no skin tone, medium skin tone) emoji captures a tender moment with a warm, rosy flush on the woman's cheeks and a gentle, closed-mouth expression. The soft, rounded edges and subtle glossy sheen characteristic of Apple's design language lend a sweet and affectionate tone to this intimate gesture. This emoji, as seen on Apple devices, is perfect for conveying love, affection, or a warm greeting between individuals.
